data.title: Valley Guns â€“ Gun Shop
data.text:
Valley Guns, established in 1977 & incorporated in 1979, is now doing business as Valley Guns II in Inwood WV. We are a family owned and operated company with over 40 years of providing excellent customer service, quality firearms, expert advice and quality training to the tri-state area. With 5200 square feet of retail space, we are the largest family owned & operated retail gun shop in the tri-state area. We are a stocking dealer for , LWRC, Colt, Remington, Springfield, Savage, Ruger, Glock, Smith & Wesson, Kimber, H&K, Sig Sauer, Henry, Browning, Wilson Combat, Weatherby.

We are a GLOCK Blue Label Dealer.

Our Firearms Training is second to none.

We offer to the public a 40-yard and 100-yard Rifle ONLY Range. This range is great for sighting in your rifles before hunting season.
